more_content:
Can you believe it’s the 40th year of Fantasy Fest? It’s hard to imagine that the 10-day extravaganza began as a humble weekend party to boost tourism during a slow season on the island. If you’re attending this year, it’s a good idea to read about what to expect, what to pack, and where to go. 

Here’s an overview of all things Fantasy Fest.

New to Fantasy Fest?

Those new to the scene can avoid rookie mistakes by being in the know with A First-Timer’s Guide to Fantasy Fest.

Goombay Fest in Bahama Village

Fantasy Fest kicks off its first weekend with The Goombay Festival. The street fair is held in the vibrant Bahama Village neighborhood and celebrates the rich music, cultures, food, and dance of the island’s Caribbean roots. This is one of the limited family-friendly events of Fantasy Fest, so round up the kids!

Costumes (or lack thereof)

Fantasy Fest manages to outdo Halloween, with costumes front-and-center. Body paint is a popular choice for most, but you’ll want to take warm temperatures and a sometimes unforgiving sun into account. Not sure what to do? Read up on Fantasy Fest costume tips, from where to get painted up to practical considerations, like footwear.

Survival Tips

Aside from costumes, there are ground rules, photo-snapping etiquette, open-container laws and transportation issues to contend with. You definitely don’t want these little details hampering your good time during Fantasy Fest. Be two steps ahead of the rest by reading up on 5 Tips to Surviving Fantasy Fest.

Best of Fantasy Fest

Fantasy Fest has funky traditions, like the royal coronation, the headdress ball, tutu Tuesdays, pet masquerades, and more. There are so many events that take place over the 10-day fest it’s enough to make your head spin. Refer to our Best of Fantasy Fest guide that covers the best event of each day.

Book with us at 24 North Hotel

What are you waiting for? 24 North Hotel has awesome amenities that sets it apart from the rest, such as hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square in Old Town. It also has a Starbucks on site, an awesome pool area, lounge, poolside restaurant, and clean, comfortable rooms. 

Check out our rooms here, and look to see which of our online specials work for you.
title: All Things Fantasy Fest
